title: WANTED: Broad Leaf 460 - Trade Bait [Drum, Uzit, Lenox, Carolina Brights etc.]
author: DerekMichael

posts.post_title: WANTED: Broad Leaf 460 - Trade Bait [Drum, Uzit, Lenox, Carolina Brights etc.]
posts.post_content:
Greetings fellow net54 enthusiasts.

I am currently interested in adding the Broad Leaf 460 back to my collection. I can include cash, as well as a nice assortment of cards. If you have a potential match, please feel free to write to me and we can exchange scans and talk about a potential deal.

A few pieces I have in trade:

Drum ... Hooks Wiltse "pitching" ... PSA 2 (MC)
Uzit ... Fred Merkle "throwing" ... PSA 2
Uzit ... Orval Overall "hands face level" ... SGC 1.5
Lenox ... Frank Chance (HOF) "portrait - yellow" ... SGC 1
Carolina Brights ... Chief Bender (HOF) "trees in background" ... SGC 1.5
Carolina Brights ... John Titus ... SGC 2
Cycle 460 ... Mordecai Brown (HOF) "Chicago" ... SGC 1.5

I sincerely thank you for your time.

Derek

I would like to bump this thread.

Thank you!

Derek
